titleStmt.title: The metynge of Doctor Barons and doctor Powell at Paradise gate [and] of theyr communications bothe drawen to Smithfylde fro[m] the towar. The one burned for heresye as the papistes do saye truly and the other quartered for popery and all within one houre.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the signe of the Hyll, at the west dore of Paules. By Wyllyam Hill. and there to be sold,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Hyll, at the west dore of Paules. By Wyllyam Hill.
